requirement: Audit logs are enabled and active for all system components and cardholder data.

api-gw-xray-enabled.details: No evidence provided to confirm X-Ray tracing is enabled on Amazon API Gateway REST APIs. Insufficient logging and tracing configuration.

api-gwv2-access-logs-enabled.details: No evidence of access logging configuration for Amazon API Gateway V2 stages. Logging is crucial for audit trail.

appsync-logging-enabled.details: No confirmation of AppSync API logging. Logging should be enabled with appropriate log levels for comprehensive audit trails.

cloudfront-accesslogs-enabled.details: No evidence of CloudFront distribution access logs configuration to an S3 bucket. Logging is essential for tracking access and potential security incidents.

cloudtrail-enabled.details: No proof of AWS CloudTrail trail being enabled in the AWS account. CloudTrail is critical for comprehensive audit logging of AWS API activities.

ecs-task-definition-log-configuration.details: No documentation of log configuration for active ECS Task Definitions. Container logging is crucial for monitoring and auditing.

eks-cluster-logging-enabled.details: No confirmation of logging enablement for Amazon EKS clusters. Cluster logging is important for tracking cluster-level events.

elastic-beanstalk-logs-to-cloudwatch.details: No evidence of Elastic Beanstalk environments configured to send logs to CloudWatch. Centralized logging is essential for comprehensive audit trails.

mq-cloudwatch-audit-log-enabled.details: No proof of CloudWatch audit logging for Amazon MQ brokers. Audit logging is critical for tracking messaging system activities.

mq-cloudwatch-audit-logging-enabled.details: No documentation of CloudWatch audit logging for Amazon MQ brokers. Duplicate rule suggests critical importance of logging.

multi-region-cloudtrail-enabled.details: No evidence of multi-region AWS CloudTrail configuration. Multi-region trails are crucial for comprehensive logging across all regions.

neptune-cluster-cloudwatch-log-export-en.details: No confirmation of CloudWatch log export for Amazon Neptune clusters. Database audit logging is essential for tracking data access.

netfw-logging-enabled.details: No evidence of logging configuration for AWS Network Firewall. Network-level logging is critical for security monitoring.

step-functions-state-machine-logging-ena.details: No proof of logging enablement for AWS Step Functions state machines. Workflow logging is important for tracking state transitions.

waf-classic-logging-enabled.details: No documentation of logging for AWS WAF classic global web ACLs. Web application firewall logging is crucial for security monitoring.
